# AbiFunction type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AbiFunction = {
  name: string;
  inputs: z.output<typeof AbiTypeSchema>[];
  outputs: z.output<typeof AbiTypeSchema>[];
  signature: string;
  stateMutability: string;
  comment: string;
};
```
